info.title: Memobase API
info.summary: APIs for Memobase, a user memory system for LLM Apps

get.description: Check if your memobase is set up correctly

x-code-samples.source:
# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase

memobase = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')

assert memobase.ping()
x-code-samples.label: Python
JavaScript
Go

x-code-samples.source:
# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase

memobase = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')

config = memobase.get_config()
x-code-samples.label: Python
JavaScript

uid = client.add_user({"ANY": "DATA"})

x-code-samples.source:
# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase
from memobase.core.types import BlobType

memobase = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')

user = memobase.get_user('user_id')
blobs = user.get_all(BlobType.CHAT)
x-code-samples.label: Python
JavaScript
Go

parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: The ID of the user to insert the blob for
schema.title: User Id

parameters.description: The ID of the user to insert the blob for

schema.description: The blob data to insert

x-code-samples.source:
# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase
from memobase import ChatBlob

client = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')

b = ChatBlob(messages=[
    {
        "role": "user",
        "content": "Hi, I'm here again"
    },
    {
        "role": "assistant",
        "content": "Hi, Gus! How can I help you?"
    }
])
u = client.get_user(uid)
bid = u.insert(b)
x-code-samples.label: Python
JavaScript
Go

get.description: Get the real-time user profiles for long term memory

parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: The ID of the user to get profiles for
schema.title: User Id

parameters.description: The ID of the user to get profiles for

parameters.name: topk

schema.description: Number of profiles to retrieve, default is all
schema.title: Topk

parameters.description: Number of profiles to retrieve, default is all

parameters.name: max_token_size

schema.description: Max token size of returned profile content, default is all
schema.title: Max Token Size

parameters.description: Max token size of returned profile content, default is all

parameters.name: prefer_topics

schema.description: Rank prefer topics at first to try to keep them in filtering, default order is by updated time
schema.title: Prefer Topics

parameters.description: Rank prefer topics at first to try to keep them in filtering, default order is by updated time

parameters.name: only_topics

schema.description: Only return profiles with these topics, default is all
schema.title: Only Topics

parameters.description: Only return profiles with these topics, default is all

parameters.name: max_subtopic_size

schema.description: Max subtopic size of the same topic in returned profile, default is all
schema.title: Max Subtopic Size

parameters.description: Max subtopic size of the same topic in returned profile, default is all

parameters.name: topic_limits_json

schema.description: Set specific subtopic limits for topics in JSON, for example {"topic1": 3, "topic2": 5}. The limits in this param will override `max_subtopic_size`.
schema.title: Topic Limits Json

parameters.description: Set specific subtopic limits for topics in JSON, for example {"topic1": 3, "topic2": 5}. The limits in this param will override `max_subtopic_size`.

from memobase import Memobase

client = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')

u = client.get_user(uid)
p = u.profile()

# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase

client = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')

profile_id = u.add_profile("value", "topic", "sub_topic")
u.update_profile(profile_id, "value2", "topic2", "sub_topic2")

schema.description: Event data to update

x-code-samples.source:
# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase

client = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')
uid = client.add_user()
u = client.get_user(uid)
# ... insert messages to user

events = u.event(topk=5)
eid = events[0].id

u.update_event(eid, {"event_tip": "The event is about..."})
print(u.event(topk=1))
x-code-samples.label: Python

parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: The ID of the user
schema.title: User Id

parameters.description: The ID of the user

parameters.name: event_id

schema.description: The ID of the event
schema.title: Event Id

parameters.description: The ID of the event

x-code-samples.source:
# To use the Python SDK, install the package:
# pip install memobase

from memobase import Memobase

client = Memobase(project_url='PROJECT_URL', api_key='PROJECT_TOKEN')
uid = client.add_user()
u = client.get_user(uid)
# ... insert messages to user

events = u.event(topk=1)
print(events)

eid = events[0].id
u.delete_event(eid)

print(u.event(topk=1))
x-code-samples.label: Python
